basics.name: Arun Gopi
basics.headline: Billing Operations Manager | 16+ Years Experience in IT  | Revenue Cycle Management | DP-600 Certified, Data Engineering and Power BI

items.name: Microsoft Certified: Fabric Analytics Engineer Associate

items.summary:
• Designed and maintained scalable end to end data pipelines and data warehouse solutions to support comprehensive billing and revenue analytics.

  • Developed advanced Power BI dashboards and reports to monitor key performance indicators such as receivables, collections, billing accuracy, and accounts receivable.

  • Utilized Excel, Google Sheet, SQL and data engineering best practices to integrate, transform, and optimize large volumes of billing data for actionable insights.

  • Automated data processing workflows to improve reporting timeliness and accuracy, enabling senior management to make data-driven decisions.

  • Led training sessions on Power BI usage, report creation, and dashboard interpretation, enhancing team capabilities in data analysis and visualization.

  • Managed medical billing operations, resolving billing discrepancies, ensuring compliance, and collaborating with coding, finance, and clinical teams.

  • Provided coaching on medical billing software and processes, increasing overall team productivity and accuracy.

• Utilized Excel and Google Sheets to analyze, visualize, and report on weekly and monthly receivables, collections, billing, payments, and accounts receivable, providing actionable insights to senior management.

  • Developed and maintained Power BI dashboards and reports to track key billing metrics and identify trends for continuous improvement.

  • Managed day-to-day medical billing operations across multiple departments, supervising a team of 40 employees and coordinating departmental activities.

  • Identified training needs and delivered coaching on medical billing procedures and EHR software to improve team performance and compliance.

• Coordinated office activities and operations to ensure efficiency and compliance with company policies.

  • Supervised administrative staff, delegated responsibilities, and monitored performance.

  • Managed agendas, travel arrangements, and appointments for upper management.

  • Handled phone calls, correspondence (email, letters, packages), and internal communications.

items.name: Microsoft Fabric End to End Project for Management
items.description: An end-to-end data solution using Microsoft Fabric integrating Excel, Azure SQL, Fabric Data Lake & Data Warehouse, and Google Sheets to deliver a 16-page management reporting environment.
items.summary:
Key Points:

  • Architected data pipelines to ingest and cleanse data from multiple sources into Fabric Data Lake.

  • Developed a centralized data warehouse for unified analytics.

  • Optimized data processing with incremental loads and partitioning.

  • Created advanced Power BI reports leveraging Fabric Data Warehouse.

  • Implemented governance and security policies for data access control.

  • Conducted training and developed documentation to facilitate user adoption.

items.name: Power BI Embedded NextJS App Implementation
items.description: Development and deployment of a Power BI Embedded application using the Next.js framework to enhance data visualization and accessibility through a secure, cloud-hosted environment.
items.summary:
Key Points:

  • Built the application using the Next.js framework for efficient server-rendered React-based web experience.

  • Integrated Power BI Embedded to embed interactive reports and dashboards directly in the app.

  • Employed Prisma ORM for seamless database management and queries.

  • Used PostgreSQL as the primary database for storing application and user data.

  • Hosted the application on Azure Virtual Machines to ensure reliability and scalability.

  • Implemented social login authentication to provide secure and user-friendly access.

items.name: Power BI Dashboard for Management
items.description: A 16-page interactive Power BI dashboard integrating multiple data sources to provide comprehensive management insights.
items.summary:
Key Points:

  • Integrated data from Excel, MongoDB, and Google Sheets into a unified reporting platform.

  • Designed interactive visuals and filters for dynamic data exploration.

  • Utilized Power Query for data transformation and cleaning.

  • Scheduled automated data refreshes for real-time updates.

  • Developed KPI metrics and trend analysis reports to support decision-making.

  • Implemented role-based access control to secure sensitive data.

items.name: Regional Leadership Dashboards in Power BI
items.description: A set of Power BI dashboards including 5 overview pages and additional pages customized for individual offices, consolidating multiple data sources for regional performance monitoring.
items.summary:
Key Points:

  • Delivered regional summaries with drill-down to office-level details.

  • Customized dashboards for each office with localized KPIs.

  • Employed efficient data modeling for Excel and Google Sheets sources.

  • Enabled comparative analysis across regions for operational insights.

  • Created automated alerts and visual cues for critical metrics.

items.name: Department-wise Dashboards in Power BI
items.description: Department-specific Power BI dashboards with single overview pages and additional pages for offices using multiple data sources, focused on tracking departmental performance.
items.summary:
Key Points:

  • Tailored dashboards to department-specific metrics and goals.

  • Provided navigation between consolidated department views and individual office data.

  • Applied advanced DAX calculations to measure productivity and billing accuracy.

  • Incorporated stakeholder feedback for continuous improvement.
